nodes.text: The Jedi Temple on Kordoku was a Jedi site that held a key to the galaxy's past which allowed the user to travel to different points in time.

In or after 35 ABY, Rey Skywalker was directed by the sacred Jedi texts to visit the temple on Life Day to use the key to the galaxy's past so a Jedi's future would become clear. She entered the temple, used the force to retrieve the key from inside, and used it.
